question:
Fill in the blank to make the statement equal.
16 - 4 = 18 - ___

Fill in the blank to make the statement equal.
19 - __  =  18 - 4

Fill in the blank to make the statement equal.
___ - 2 = 8 - 3
Sam had 3 apples. His friend gave him 4 more apples. How many apples does Sam have now?
Lily had 8 cookies. She gave 5 cookies to her friends. How many cookies does Lily have left?
